text: James Patrick Caviezel, Jr. (; born September 26, 1968) is an American movie actor. He is sometimes called Jim Caviezel. He is probably best known for playing the part of Jesus Christ in the 2004 movie The Passion of the Christ. == Filmography == Year Movie Role Director 1991 My Own Private Idaho Airline Clerk Gus Van Sant 1992 Diggstown Billy Hargrove Michael Ritchie 1994 Wyatt Earp Warren Earp Lawrence Kasdan 1996 Ed Dizzy Anderson Bill Couturié The Rock Rear F/A-18 Pilot Michael Bay 1997 G.I.
